title: Let Me Watch, Let Me Watch 𝅘𝅥𝅮
detail_text: <:th_ch0005/>Mia-chan, Rin wants to watch you compose your songs~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>There isn’t anything interesting to see, though......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Rin and Kayo-chin usually go and watch Maki-chan compose. That’s why Rin is interested in seeing how Mia-chan composes her songs, nya.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Huff...... Fine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>What do you use to compose, Mia-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>I use my PC. Sometimes I also use a smartphone app. Here, just come and watch.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Mia-chan, you got this! Come on! 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Why are you cheering me on when I’m focused on composing!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>It makes Maki-chan happy, nya~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>......Maki is amazing......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
